title: Biden and Harris WIN, Eva Longoria Comments, Church Complaints and more.
itunes:title: Biden and Harris WIN, Eva Longoria Comments, Church Complaints and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! The Steve Harvey Morning Show is in full effect and the weekend of celebration continues. The Chief Love Officer guides the lonely sidechick of a football player that is looking to be a main chick to someone. The U-Haul ministry of The Jackpot Joint of Jerusalem needs gas money for its 42 vehicle fleet as it will be going to Washington D.C. in January. President-elect Biden and Vice-President-elect Harris make their first victory speeches. Big Dog shows love to South Carolina for their role in the election. Our guy Jeffery brings up two important things when he called in. Eva Longoria caught backlash and had to apologize for her comments about Black women voters. Tommy reports that Tom Brady got spanked by the Who Dat Nation in his Sports Report. Big Tony outta Philly had the crew crackin' up with his comments about Trump. Today in Closing Remarks, Steve brings to our attention the things that he learned from this election.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
